sentences.en: Electricity needs metallurgy and magnetism; corporations first require banking skills.

sentences.en: Fly ash strengthened aluminium matrix composite was prepared using powder metallurgy technique.
sentences.cn: 采用粉末冶金法制备粉煤灰增强铝基复合材料.

sentences.en: Have food, chemical, metallurgy, precision machinery, textile, paper and other industries.

sentences.en: He studied metallurgy as a mature student, having spent ten years working in a foundry.
sentences.cn: 在一家铸造厂工作了10年以后,他成为成人学生学习冶金专业。

sentences.en: In metallurgy industry, iodine is used for purifying high pure metal.
sentences.cn: 在冶金工业中, 碘用于精炼高纯度金属.

sentences.en: Semisolid forming has taken its place among advanced metallurgy material processing fields.

sentences.en: Surface metallurgy plasma jet is a new coating technology.
sentences.cn: 等离子束表面冶金是一种新的表面涂层技术.

sentences.en: This product is manufactured by powder metallurgy through compacting and pressure working.
